Articles.Content: In playing career mode I can't get any contracts to appear after the intial four. I've tried reinstalling, deleting the game in steamapps, and verifying game files. Nothing seems to work. Any suggestions?
They may not appear immediately, leaving the savegame and returning should make them generate though.
They still do not appear. I even fast forwarded the game to day 100. I feel like I'm missing something..
